gaia::core::Widget * mpWidget

Detailed Description

A popup widget that can be used to display an arbitrary widget.

The popup widget is a floating container that appears on top of the current activity.

    MyTouchListener::MyTouchListener(Page* page)
        : OnTouchListener(page)
    {
           mpage = page;
    }

    MyTouchListener::~MyTouchListener()
    {
    }

    bool MyTouchListener::onTouch(Widget* v, MotionEvent* event)
    {
           gaia::ui::PopupWidget *mPopupwidget = new gaia::ui::PopupWidget(mpage);
           mPopupwidget->setSize(ControllerParams::MATCH_PARENT,ControllerParams::WRAP_CONTENT);
           Button *mpBtn = new Button(this);
           mpBtn->setId(999);
           mpBtn->setText();
           mPopupwidget->setWidget(mpBtn);
           mPopupwidget->showAtLocation(v, Gravity::CENTER, 0, 0);
           return false;
    }

    void EmptyPageTest::onInit(Persistence* const p)
    {
           OnTouchListener* listener = new MyTouchListener(this);
           mpBtn1 = new FakeButton(this);
           mpBtn1->setId(100);
           mpBtn1->setText();
           mpBtn1->setOnTouchListener(listener);
           mpCtrl = new LinearController(this);
           mpCtrl->setId(102);
           mpCtrl->addWidget(mpBtn1);
           mScene->attachController(mpCtrl);
           mScene->setupSceneLayout();
    }

Change the animation style resource for this popup.

Parameters:
animationStyleanimation style to use when the popup appears and disappears. Set to -1 for the default animation, 0 for no animation, or a resource identifier for an explicit animation.

Parameters:

void gaia::ui::PopupWidget::setClippingEnabled ( bool  enabled)

Allows the popup widget to extend beyond the bounds of the screen.

By default the window is clipped to the screen boundaries. Setting this to false will allow windows to be accurately positioned.

If the popup is showing, calling this method will take effect only the next time the popup is shown or through a manual call to one of the update() methods.

Parameters:
enabledfalse if the window should be allowed to extend outside of the screen
void gaia::ui::PopupWidget::setFocusable ( bool  focusable)

Changes the focusability of the popup widget.

Parameters:
focusabletrue if the popup should grab focus, false otherwise.

void gaia::ui::PopupWidget::showAsDropDown ( gaia::core::Widget *  anchor,
int32_t  xoff,
int32_t  yoff 
)

Display the content widget in a popup widget anchored to the bottom-left corner of the anchor widget.

If there is not enough room on screen to show the popup in its entirety, this method tries to find a parent scroll widget to scroll. If no parent scroll widget can be scrolled, the bottom-left corner of the popup is pinned at the top left corner of the anchor widget.

Parameters:
anchorthe widget on which to pin the popup widget
xoffthe popup's x location offset
yoffthe popup's y location offset
void gaia::ui::PopupWidget::showAtLocation ( gaia::core::Widget *  parent,
int32_t  gravity,
int32_t  x,
int32_t  y 
)

Display the content widget in a popup widget at the specified location.

Parameters:
parentthe anchor of widget
gravitythe gravity which controls the placement of the popup widget
xthe popup's x location offset
ythe popup's y location offset
void gaia::ui::PopupWidget::update ( )

Updates the state of the popup widget, if it is currently being displayed, from the currently set state.

void gaia::ui::PopupWidget::update ( int32_t  width,
int32_t  height 
)

Updates the dimension of the popup widget.

Calling this function also updates the window with the current popup state as described for update().

Parameters:
widththe new width
heightthe new height
void gaia::ui::PopupWidget::update ( int32_t  x,
int32_t  y,
int32_t  width,
int32_t  height 
)

Updates the position and the dimension of the popup widget.

Width and height can be set to -1 to update location only. Calling this function also updates the window with the current popup state as described for update().

Parameters:
xthe new x location
ythe new y location
widththe new width, can be -1 to ignore
heightthe new height, can be -1 to ignore
void gaia::ui::PopupWidget::update ( int32_t  x,
int32_t  y,
int32_t  width,
int32_t  height,
bool  force 
)

Updates the position and the dimension of the popup widget.

Width and height can be set to -1 to update location only. Calling this function also updates the window with the current popup state as described for update().

Parameters:
xthe new x location
ythe new y location
widththe new width, can be -1 to ignore
heightthe new height, can be -1 to ignore
forcereposition the window even if the specified position already seems to correspond to the LayoutParams
void gaia::ui::PopupWidget::update ( const core::Widget &  anchor,
int32_t  width,
int32_t  height 
)

Updates the position and the dimension of the popup widget.

Calling this function also updates the window with the current popup state as described for update().

Parameters:
anchorthe popup's anchor widget
widththe new width, can be -1 to ignore
heightthe new height, can be -1 to ignore
void gaia::ui::PopupWidget::update ( const core::Widget &  anchor,
int32_t  xoff,
int32_t  yoff,
int32_t  width,
int32_t  height 
)

Updates the position and the dimension of the popup widget.

Width and height can be set to -1 to update location only. Calling this function also updates the window with the current popup state as described for update().

If the widget later scrolls to move anchor to a different location, the popup will be moved correspondingly.

Parameters:
anchorthe popup's anchor widget
xoffx offset from the widget's left edge
yoffy offset from the widget's bottom edge
widththe new width, can be -1 to ignore
heightthe new height, can be -1 to ignore
